title: Humphrey's Bedtime
description: Even big girls get tired sometimes!"Story time," said Mommy.Humphrey was all snuggly and sleepy.But Lottie didn't want her story. She said, "I don't go to bed yet. I am a BIG GIRL."Humphrey is busy getting ready for bed, but Lottie has far more important things to do. She has to take care of her stuffed animals and make sure they are ready for bed. Luckily, Lottie is a big girl, so she gets to stay up very, very late. But it's hard work getting all those babies ready for bed, and even big girls get tired sometimes.Humphrey, the endearing toddler from Humphrey's Corner , is back. In this charming companion book readers meet Humphrey's big sister, Lottie, and a familiar bedtime ritual takes on a whole new meaning.
author: Sally Hunter
